About Me

I am seeking a computer science position with an organization where I can apply my knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and Python to grow the success of the company. I am very team oriented and have learned through my experiences playing collegiate baseball and working on a packaging line the importance of each contributor.
